options.label: Division of shares after tax (Benham)
options.willClauseText: Inheritance Tax payable on my Residuary Estate shall be deducted before the calculation of shares passing to exempt and non-exempt beneficiaries (Benham calculation).

options.label: Division of shares before tax (Ratcliffe - default)
options.willClauseText: Inheritance Tax payable on my Residuary Estate shall be borne by the non-exempt beneficiaries' shares (Ratcliffe calculation).
